violations.message: Import of random module is forbidden - violates Zero-Simulation mandate
Import of time module is forbidden - use DRV_ClockService instead
Import of datetime module is forbidden - use DRV_ClockService instead
Use of floating-point literals is forbidden - use CertifiedMath fixed-point instead
Use of random.random is forbidden - violates Zero-Simulation mandate
Use of time.time is forbidden - use DRV_ClockService instead
Use of floating-point literals is forbidden - use CertifiedMath fixed-point instead
